name: Space Shooter (M TD)
description:
Space Shooter is an old-school arcade game with a modern twist. The modern twist being that you can upgrade and customize your spaceship!

The game has:

  • 5 Different enemies (with 2 bosses!)
  • One long level with a lot of variety
  • Brutal Difficulty
  • Customize your spaceship!
  • 5 Upgrades to help you progress!

The goal of the game is to complete the level with as little as possible money spent and with the fastest time! 

Controls:

  • Press [A] and [D] or arrow keys to move
  • Press [SPACE] to shoot
  • Press [W] or arrow keys to launch a bomb (if ready)
  • Press [SHIFT] + [A] or [D] or arrow keys to dodge (if ready)
  • Press [BACKSPACE] to go to main menu when paused
  • Press [TAB] in the pause menu to save and exit the game
  • Press [ALT] + [ENTER] to go fullscreen

This game autosaves your progress, you can delete your savefile in the store menu.

For any questions or comments please email me: pieterdeboer028@gmail.com
